channel.title: Other on David R. Hill
channel.description: Recent content in Other on David R. Hill

item.title: Three lessons for the road ahead
item.description: Last winter I served as course director for Clinical Immunology at Eastern Michigan University’s School of Health Sciences. Although I’ve had some experience assisting with both undergraduate and graduate level courses in the past, this was my first experience as the course director and sole instructor for a college-level course. The whole process was exciting, challenging, and, ultimately, personally rewarding. It reinforced my long-standing enthusiasm for teaching and led to a number of important insights for me personally and professionally.
